 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חַג‎</span> **noun masculine**<sup>[[Isa.29.1|Isa 29:1]]</sup> ==festival-gathering, feast, pilgrim-feast== (Late Hebrew ***id.***; Aramaic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חַגָּא‎</span>; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***pilgrimage***; Sabean <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חג‎</span> [[BDB#DHM|DHM]]<sup>Epigr. Denkm. 31</sup>; [[BDB#Nö|Nö]]<sup>ZMG 1887. 719</sup>; [[BDB#RS|RS]]<sup>Proph. Lect. ii. n. 6</sup>; &gt; [[BDB#We|We]]<sup>Skizzen iii. 106, 165</sup> ***sacred dance***) — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חַג‎</span> absolute and construct [[Exod.10.9|Exod 10:9]] + 36 t.; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חָ֑ג‎</span> [[Num.28.17|Num 28:17]] + 13 t.; suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חַגִּי‎</span> [[Exod.23.18|Exod 23:18]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חַגֶּ֑ךָ‎</span> [[Deut.16.14|Deut 16:14]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חַגָּהּ‎</span> [[Hos.2.13|Hos 2:13]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חַגֵּנוּ‎</span> [[Ps.81.4|Ps 81:4]] plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חַגִּים‎</span> [[Isa.29.1|Isa 29:1]] + 2 t.; suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חַגַּיִךְ‎</span> [[Nah.2.1|Nah 2:1]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חַגֵּיכֶם‎</span> [[Amos.5.21|Amos 5:21]] + 2 t.; — 

**1.** ***feast***, especially one observed by a ***pilgrimage*** ([[Exod.23.14|Exod 23:14]]; [[Exod.23.17|Exod 23:17]]): 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **a.** ***special feast*** to the golden calf [[Exod.32.5|Exod 32:5]] ([[BDB#J|J]]; where there was a sacred dance v[[Exod.32.19|Exod 32:19]]); a feast in the 8th month observed by Jeroboam in place of the feast of the 7th month in Judah [[1Kgs.12.32|1Kgs 12:32]]; [[1Kgs.12.33|1Kgs 12:33]] pilgrim feast proposed by Moses [[Exod.10.9|Exod 10:9]] ([[BDB#J|J]][[BDB#E|E]]); feast at Shiloh [[Judg.21.19|Judg 21:19]]. Elsewhere 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** apparently always of the three great pilgrim feasts, celebrated by processions and dancing: (1) ***in general*** [[Isa.30.29|Isa 30:29]]; [[Amos.8.10|Amos 8:10]]; [[Nah.2.1|Nah 2:1]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חגים ינקפו‎</span> ***let feasts come round*** [[Isa.29.1|Isa 29:1]] \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עצרות‎</span> [[Amos.5.21|Amos 5:21]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חַג לי‎</span> [[Lev.23.41|Lev 23:41]] ([[BDB#H|H]]); distinguished from the more general <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מועדים‎</span> (sacred seasons) [[Ezek.45.17|Ezek 45:17]]; [[Ezek.46.11|Ezek 46:11]]; [[Hos.9.5|Hos 9:5]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יום חג‎</span>), and from specific <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חדשׁים‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁבתות‎</span> as well, [[Hos.2.13|Hos 2:13]] (2) in particular: unleavened cakes and Passover <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חג (ה)מצות‎</span> [[Exod.23.15|Exod 23:15]] = [[Exod.34.18|Exod 34:18]] ([[BDB#J|J]][[BDB#E|E]]); [[Lev.23.6|Lev 23:6]] ([[BDB#P|P]]), [[Deut.16.16|Deut 16:16]]; [[2Chr.8.13|2Chr 8:13]]; [[2Chr.30.13|2Chr 30:13]]; [[2Chr.30.21|2Chr 30:21]]; [[2Chr.35.17|2Chr 35:17]]; [[Ezra.6.22|Ezra 6:22]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חג‎</span> [[Exod.12.14|Exod 12:14]] ([[BDB#P|P]]); first day of the seven [[Num.28.17|Num 28:17]] ([[BDB#P|P]]); the last day [[Exod.13.6|Exod 13:6]] ([[BDB#J|J]]); the seven [[Ezek.45.21|Ezek 45:21]]; [[Ezek.45.23|Ezek 45:23]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חג הפסח‎</span> [[Exod.34.25|Exod 34:25]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חגי‎</span> [[Exod.23.18|Exod 23:18]] (both [[BDB#J|J]] [[BDB#E|E]]); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בַּכֶּסֶה לְיּוֺם חַגֵּנוּ‎</span> [[Ps.81.4|Ps 81:4]] (probably the full moon of Passover); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חג הקציר‎</span> [[Exod.23.16|Exod 23:16]] = <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חג שׁבעת‎</span> [[Exod.34.22|Exod 34:22]] ([[BDB#J|J]][[BDB#E|E]]), compare [[Deut.16.10|Deut 16:10]]; [[Deut.16.16|Deut 16:16]]; [[2Chr.8.13|2Chr 8:13]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חג האס(י)ף‎</span> [[Exod.23.16|Exod 23:16]] = [[Exod.34.22|Exod 34:22]] ([[BDB#J|J]][[BDB#E|E]]) = <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חג הסכ(ו)ת‎</span> [[Lev.23.34|Lev 23:34]] ([[BDB#P|P]]), [[Deut.16.13|Deut 16:13]]; [[Deut.16.16|Deut 16:16]]; [[Deut.31.10|Deut 31:10]]; [[2Chr.8.13|2Chr 8:13]]; [[Ezra.3.4|Ezra 3:4]]; [[Zech.14.16|Zech 14:16]]; [[Zech.14.18|Zech 14:18]]; [[Zech.14.19|Zech 14:19]] also <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חג י‎</span> [[Lev.23.39|Lev 23:39]] ([[BDB#H|H]]), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֶחָג‎</span> [[1Kgs.8.2|1Kgs 8:2]]; [[1Kgs.8.65|1Kgs 8:65]] = [[2Chr.5.3|2Chr 5:3]]; [[2Chr.7.8|2Chr 7:8]]; [[2Chr.7.9|2Chr 7:9]]; [[Ezra.4.5|Ezra 4:5]]; [[Neh.8.14|Neh 8:14]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַגֶּךָ֑‎</span> (i.e. of people) [[Deut.16.14|Deut 16:14]] 7 days [[Num.29.12|Num 29:12]] ([[BDB#P|P]]), [[Neh.8.18|Neh 8:18]]. — Verbs with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חג‎</span> are: <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חגג‎</span> [[Lev.23.39|Lev 23:39]]; [[Lev.23.41|Lev 23:41]] ([[BDB#H|H]]), [[Exod.12.14|Exod 12:14]]; [[Num.29.12|Num 29:12]] ([[BDB#P|P]]), [[Nah.2.1|Nah 2:1]]; [[Zech.14.16|Zech 14:16]]; [[Zech.14.18|Zech 14:18]]; [[Zech.14.19|Zech 14:19]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁמר‎</span> [[Exod.23.15|Exod 23:15]] = [[Exod.34.18|Exod 34:18]] ([[BDB#J|J]][[BDB#E|E]]); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎התקדשׁ‎</span> [[Isa.30.29|Isa 30:29]] but usually <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עשׂה‎</span> [[Exod.34.22|Exod 34:22]] ([[BDB#J|J]][[BDB#E|E]]), [[Deut.16.10|Deut 16:10]]; [[Deut.16.13|Deut 16:13]]; [[1Kgs.8.65|1Kgs 8:65]]; [[1Kgs.12.32|1Kgs 12:32]]; [[1Kgs.12.33|1Kgs 12:33]]; [[2Chr.7.8|2Chr 7:8]]; [[2Chr.7.9|2Chr 7:9]]; [[2Chr.30.13|2Chr 30:13]]; [[2Chr.30.21|2Chr 30:21]]; [[2Chr.35.17|2Chr 35:17]]; [[Ezra.3.4|Ezra 3:4]]; [[Ezra.6.22|Ezra 6:22]]; [[Neh.8.18|Neh 8:18]]. 

**2.** ***festival sacrifice*** (compare Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֲגִיגָה‎</span>) [[Ps.118.27|Ps 118:27]] (see <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מזבח‎</span> **12**); [[Mal.2.3|Mal 2:3]] ([[BDB#RV|RV]] after [[BDB#Thes|Thes]] [[BDB#Ke|Ke]] and others: but [[BDB#AV|AV]] [[BDB#Ew|Ew]] Or ***feast***).
